refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis
refsynopsisdiv.para: Used to control the inclusion declarations on elements with inclusions.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The *.inclusion parameter entities parameterize element inclusions. You can selectively include or remove elements from the inclusion by changing the appropriate parameter entity. For example, if you remove BeginPage from the ubiq.inclusion parameter entity, it is no longer included everywhere in DocBook.
In the XML version of DocBook V4, there are no inclusion entities because inclusions are not part of XML.
